msg: LUCENE-2653: ThaiAnalyzer assumes things about your jre

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3136: cxfbean component should use existing bean instance instead of re-creating a new instance.

author: buscob
msg: - Removed several ***Adm requests from webtools application. Used view-last/save-last-view pattern instead to have the same portlet handling requests usable from everywhere.
- Replaced AddPortlet request and view-map with addPortlet. This seems to be the standard we use.

- Portlet attributes are now edited using a dedicated screen. This is how it works in the new PortalPage widget. I used the same system in the actual PortalPage system also because it was too complicated to handle it in two different way. In any case it should not hurt.
- Removed a debug string in the PortalPageColumn renderer.
